ResearchProjectDef.label: Apiculture Basics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Basic Apini knowledge regarding honeycraft and beeswax.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Apini prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Make simple prosthetic replacements for lost Apini limbs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bionic Apini prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the design of more intricate electronic mechanical prostheses, utilizing components, servos and rotors

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Bionic Apini prosthetics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Takes the design of bionic prosthetics to the pinnacle of technology, with microelectronics and space age materials.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Apitech
ResearchProjectDef.description: Technologically, Apitech is beyond what any Apini could have dreamed, allowing the design of not only advanced prosthetics but replacement organs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Honey Conditioning
ResearchProjectDef.description: Manipulate the texture and consistency of honey, from a coagulated honey mixture with rejuvinating properties to a honey you can swim in.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Honey Refining
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of specialized capsules to ferment distilled nectar into honey.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Basic Apini Flowers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cultivate basic apini flowers: the apini daisy for mass pollenballs, frostbell for surviving hot climates.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Apini Flowers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cultivate advanced apini flowers: emberose for surviving cold climates, metalily for a metallic skin.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Body-Enhancing Apini Flowers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cultivate apini flowers that enhance the body: rushthorn for agility, vigorbloom for strength.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mind-Enhancing Apini Flowers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Cultivate apini flowers that enhance the mind: bardsong for charisma, wiserbud for intellegence.
